html:
Thus saith the Lord, the Redeemer of Israel, and his Holy One, to him whom man despiseth, to him whom the nation abhorreth, to a servant of rulers. Kings shall see and arise, princes also shall worship, because of the Lord that is faithful, and the Holy One of Israel, and he shall choose thee. (Isaiah 49:7.) Thus saith the Lord, theRedeemer of Israel, his Holy One, to him whom man despiseth. to him whom the nation abhorreth, to servant of rulers: Kings shall see and arise, princes also shall worship, because of the Lord that is faithful. (2 Ne. 21:7.)

The Book of Mormon deletes several words, as noted above, but these do not change the meaning of the verse.
